metadata.title: CVE-2022-22968 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In Spring Framework versions 5.3.0 - 5.3.18, 5.2.0 - 5.2.20, and older unsupported versions, the patterns for disallowedFields on a DataBinder are case sensitive which means a field is not effectively protected unless it is listed with both upper and lower case for the first character of the field, including upper and lower case for the first character of all nested fields within the property path.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
